website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy camp chair that has the added benefit of comfort and convenience features like an adjustable canopy.
pros: This model stands out for being well-constructed, durable, and comfortable
Users also appreciate the added benefits of features like the canopy for shade, cup holders, and storage area
cons: A few have issues with the chair's construction, and there are occasional issues with tears in the fabric
Some users say it's difficult to place in the carrying case

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the best products. I took it with me for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best products. I took it with me for the Eclipse Party. It was a very hot day in Georgia. This chair was a life saver. It was just like sitting in the shade. As the day progressed and some older ladies tired from the heat I allowed them to use my chair and both ladies said it was a blessing. I also allowed a small child who was overheating to use the chair. The chair was such a big hit. People started asking how much would I charge for 15 minutes in the chair. The chair is light and portable. It is easy to set up and take down. I love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these chairs. Have used the chairs (both) four times. Material/stitching of average quality and workmanship. Tubing has no rough edges but rivets holding tubes do not seem tight. The tubing cross support in the shade does not hold the shade securely. That said, the chairs are easy to set up and use, provide good shade and with a little care the chairs should last several years. Can't beat the price. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: WMSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great camping trip buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this chair a lot. I had bought it to keep the sun off our faces but the weather went sour on us and instead it protected us from the drizzle while we enjoyed the fire pit and a picnic outside. Was sturdy. I would the only thing that could be better is that the awning could be wider and come a little further out to be perfect. Otherwise I give it a 9.5 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Rita W

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair last year. Since it was labeled an outdoor chair, I left it outside. It faded within a week. Today, I sat in it for a few minutes while my 5-year-old granddaughter played in the yard. Started to get up to take her home. Instead, I heard SPLLLLIIIITTTT and quickly plummeted to the deck with folded torso and legs sticking straight up. There was no way to maneuver myself up and out. My granddaughter found my phone, so I called my daughter to help. This is a very dangerous "outdoor" chair and don't understand why this is Amazon's Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable shade is flimsy the caps on the ends fall off and the brace that goes across the top is REALLY flimsy and after one camping trip (I waited to review because I wanted to give a good try and not just wing it) after one trip the colors are fading. So cheap chair. The two stars was because It was a good size for me but that is about it
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Protection from both sun and rain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these chairs and they arrived on time. They are a great chair for sitting by the lake fishing and even provided shelter from a sudden downpour. At first I thought they were a little flimsy but so far they have proved sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Braddock

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs thinking I could use instead of a beach chair and a separate replacement. I only used them a couple of times when the canopy of one of the chairs froze up and refused to fold. I don't know if sand got into the mechanism, but considering they were purchased for beach use sand should not freeze up the mechanism. My husband ended up having to take the canopy off one of the chairs so the purchase was a complete bust since we wanted two chairs for the two of us with shade canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocking the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9-year-old because he was playing soccer in the summer sun. He can't set this up himself, but once I set it up, he has no problem adjusting it. We've used it all summer with no problems, and are very happy with the purchase. I can see how some parts may wear down or break over time, but I'm guessing that would be the case with any canopy chair. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A Feen

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile camping chairs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these chairs we've owned. They are a little difficult to collapse and bag after use due to the canopy, but overall they are great. Having an attached sun/rain cover has proven very valuable when we're out camping, paddle boarding, attending festival concert, etc... After nearly 10 years of use we did see these chairs start to break down. Tears in the seat cushion near the arm on one, and the plastic feet will crack where the frame tubes attach, making the chair unusable. We didn't see problems start for almost a decade, so it's still a pretty durable chair compared to most.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Foster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase; sturdy and good price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a canopied beach chair so I wouldn’t need the beach umbrella. Well, this one is absolutely wonderful! Gives me the shade I want on the beach and easy to carry, set up, and fold away when done. I wish it had a “reclining” option, but I couldn’t find any that had this feature. But it is much more comfortable that the low beach seats. I learned an expensive lesson: When you see something that looks neat in an internet ad, check to see if it’s available through Amazon. I ordered one off such an ad and it was a scam; they sent me some wire contraption that I have no idea what it was. Should have checked Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Travelingal

customer_reviews.title: Great easy first impression. Easy to unfold and adjust
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews have said before, this is a very nice chair to have. I am starting out at four star review. I will just after time of use of this chair. I purchased it because I cannot be out in the sunlight for too long because of my disability. So far it looks to be a very wonderful chair I love the little pouch on the side. Great for my cell phone and any other additional things I may have. As soon as I got it in I unfolded it and Scotchgard waterproofed the overhead shield on it. So hopefully it will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Bret Hager

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 200 lbs, 5-11. Iv'e had other folding chairs and much more comfortable and sit in for hours and fall asleep in. The two front posts dig into the backs of your thighs so bad that your legs fall asleep and ache terribly after 15-20 minutes, it's a test of tolerance. As you sit in it and the seat fabric flexes down you only have 15 inches between the hard support brackets in the front. Maybe.if your a smaller frame person, maybe it will work for you. It's Well made, sturdy, folds up like all the others, the shade feature was nice. Too bad I can't sit in it more than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: VinceP

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair! I was either dying in the sun, or awkwardly holding an umbrella, while I watched my kids play flag football all day on Saturdays. This chair saved my sanity, and my skin! It makes being a spectator so much more enjoyable! Also, it took zero effort to figure out how to set it up and tilt the shade, etc. Easy breezy!
customer_reviews.author: Corie R.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable shade tilting feature a plus
customer_reviews.text: This chair is HEAVY and the frame feels strong, but the fabric doesn't feel strong when my 254lbs sits on it. It has a 5 star for shade and a 3 star for comfort. If it did not have the shade it would be a 1 star for comfort. It is not comfortable to sit in, but I did buy it too keep the sun, at any angle in the sky, from burning me. I doubt that it will ever fit back in the original carry bag because I had to literally peel it off the chair and struggle with it due to how tight it fit. The chair folds up as easy and simply as any other chair.
customer_reviews.author: johnj_01201

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, convenient beach chair.
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair because I am a pale person in Hawaii and need all the shade I can get. I’ve taken it to the beach several times. It’s easy to open and put away again later. If it’s windy and you’re not in it, it will blow away -just FYI. The one drawback is that the metal sides are narrow and it’s nit that comfortable to sit in. It’s not terrible, and we’re I skinnier it might be perfect. But alas, I am wide through the thigh and I get a little sore. I still use it whenever I go to the beach. I love the convenience. Would love it another star if it was a tad wider.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It's not quite Navy but I love the colors. It's very comfortable, it seems large due to the arms being angled outward instead of straight. The double cup holders & snack/storage bag are a definite bonus! My favorite thing about this chair is it's oversized adjustable canopy. I always buy canopy camping chairs in this price range & my last ones lasted 10 years I don't see why with proper care these wouldn't last just as long. The chair comes with its own sturdy bag with a strap for easy carrying. All the way around a great chair especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myshele

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, falls apart fast.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very cheaply made, and doesn't last. I've had it since April of 2019, and have used it maybe 12 times at kid's weekend soccer games. The bag split open soon after the 3rd use, making it very hard to stow and carry. The fabric and stitching is very cheap and weak. The right arm fabric ripped last week, and this week the canopy support end went right through the seam it goes over. Avoid this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: It took a VERY long time to ship, but it was worth the wait. I attempt to stay out of the sun for the most part, and I take this chair to my pool. It's well-built and easy to set up. But be aware, there's a card inside the package asking you to register the product online, but when you do, they ask for all kinds of info and proof, then inform you that there's no warranty on the product -- just a 30-day "courtesy period." Piss off -- if it doesn't last longer than 30 days, I'll just file a dispute with my credit-card company. I expect it to last, but a warranty would be good business....
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good shade for most situations, but back side of shade doesn't lower enough to cover some low sun angles. Comfortable seat. Heavier than chairs without the shade, but worth it. Bought some straps (YST beach chair strap) instead of wrestling with getting chairs back in the bag all the time. Straps work great, velcro makes it easy to seal around the chair without a lot of struggle, and long shoulder strap (but not padded) for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: I love the shade this chair provides
customer_reviews.text: I love the shade this chair provides. I dont like how the canopy snaps to close. It is very unstable and can easily fold in. Also the storage bag for the chair is much smaller than the chair, so you have 1/2 of the chair sticking out of the bag. But its good to keep the sun away for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: C All

customer_reviews.title: Canopy hinge snapped in half
customer_reviews.text: Was missing an end cap piece out of the box, but it wasn't in an essential place. Chair feels sturdy, if a little too tall for a 5'4" woman like myself. Canopy is very versatile, but takes a bit of effort and creativity to set up. No instructions anywhere. Even a basic diagram would be helpful. Big problem came when trying to collapse the canopy for the first time. Snapped clean in half! And I wouldn't be described by anyone to have a lot of upper body strength. Lesson learned: apply absolutely no force to the hinges Luckily I'm still within the Amazon return timeframe.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 5 uses: UPDATED message
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE 9.Sept.2020* Customer service was very receptive and quick to respond. They quickly sent 2 new chairs at no cost. I very much appreciate their approach to rectify the product experience. I'm unfortunately very disappointed in this purchase. I bought TWO of these chairs and BOTH developed significant rips in the back within one month of use. The first chair has completely ripped through at this point (after less than 5 uses). Additionally, the chair itself is not very comfortable. I have contacted their customer service --awaiting response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the Price, But!
customer_reviews.text: However, one gets what one pays for. For the price the chairs are not bad, but if one gives gives it frequent use the product will probably not last long. We use it maybe once per week and that may be okay. However, it you plan to used this product more frequent than that, then you will find the product material (fabric) thickness and the hardware connection of all the joints on the light side. I would not purchase the chair for more frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Relax

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cup holders are slightly smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great quad chair. The one thing I didn’t like was the cup holders- our contigo water bottles (large but slim 24 oz) does not fit in the cup holders. A shame bc the size should be standardized to a car cup holder. The kids contigo water bottles fit just fine. Does a great job of blocking the sun and you do not have to use the overhead canopy but I didn’t see a way to easily disassemble it. I would buy again if we needed more, but would think twice about the cup holder situation.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the sun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these chairs to use during outdoor sporting events and concerts. The fact that you have instant shade was the biggest selling point for us. we have used these chairs several times and we find them to be comfortable and reliable. They fit easily back into the bag after foaling. I would purchase things again and recommend them for others looking for similar chairs.
customer_reviews.author: ffinch66

customer_reviews.title: This is a surprisingly comfortable chair. And the shade feature works like a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly comfortable chair. And the shade feature works like a charm. A child can set the whole rig up in less than a minute. The only alteration I made was to replace the normal sized cup holders with jumbo sized drink holders (found under marine cup holders or poker table cup holders, for like two bucks each) that will accommodate my Yeti Rambler Colster.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: Wish the chair was easier to fold back together, but you need to have puzzle instructions to do so. I just used bungee cords to fold together. Wouldn't fit back into bag it came in. I need more chairs, but probably won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: rwscls

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with functionality
customer_reviews.text: This chair is large and heavy. I never needed the shade, but found that it is awkward to set up, when I tried. It also swung down and smashed my fingers as I was putting the shade away. The cup holders are only the size of a can so larger drinks will Not fit. I did find the shade helped shelter it, when the chair was folded completely up, from the snow so the seat was dry and usable.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Price

customer_reviews.title: Durability Issues Ruin a Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have use the chair less than a dozen times for my kids soccer games, and today the back support ripped. (See photos) I am average size 5’11” and 185 pounds. I expect a significantly more durability than this. It’s also a bit of a challenge to get the chair back in the bag. I can do it, but my wife struggles.
customer_reviews.author: My $.03

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair rain or shine
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put up the first time (bars are stiff initially) but the second time, it was easy. Shade was excellent, not only for the sun but also the rain. Easy to assemble and fold for after use, Weight is a still manageable, heavier than usual chairs (maybe 5 pounds more) maybe because of the added shade.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine G.

customer_reviews.title: Bulky hard to carry.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge it’s bulky and hard to handle. I didn’t realize how big it was gonna be i would be embarrassed to bring that to the baseball field, but if you really need shade i guess it will work! It will just be a trip packing it around! But once it’s set up it does do the job and you can move it how you want it.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Really thought I was purchasing a sturdy product but it's not
customer_reviews.text: After only two uses one of the screws came out of the leg and the top part is also missing a part. Really thought I was purchasing a sturdy product but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: LaVonda

customer_reviews.title: Hold Up Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these great chairs in September of 2015. They’ve been to the beach many time plus food truck rodeos and concerts. I love the shade. If you don’t want to use the shade just fold it in back of the chair. These are very comfy and I like my drink holder. If you are looking for a sturdy and comfy chair, look no further. Plus you get that shade.
customer_reviews.author: Gemlady

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter in Florida. She goes to the beach as she is able. It was a BIG HIT with her. She loves it. It goes up easily and provides a nice shade. It is lightweight, too. It allows her to spend extra time out as she is fair-skinned. I received lots of 'thank you's' from her!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first sitting
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed the item on August 5, 2018. For the price, it looked ok. However, I only sat on it for an hour before the left side leg assembly broke. Now, I am only 175 lbs (6 ft 1' tall). This was terrible. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: This chair lasted me 2 years. 2 years of soccer games all over the southeast US, t-ball games and trips to the beach. Definitely got my money's worth and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KWeb

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Does everything as advertised. I would either like to see the canopy have more adjustment. Or the canopy have a bigger curtain on the back and the sides. Especially in the back. The space between the top of the backrest and the canopy is to big. If your sporting event starts early in the morning and your back is to the sun? You are going to wish that open area was anything but open. I figured out a janky way of using the bag as a make shift shade. That overlooked detail kept me from giving this chair 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs!! Was looking for an affordable folding chair with a sun roof and these are great. The roof part is so simple since it’s already part of the chair, folds out very easily. It’s sturdy enough to support me and my husband. I got compliments on it from strangers in the park!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected must have in Arizona
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a must-have in Arizona. My wife uses it for all of our baseball and softball games with the children. She loves it. I would buy again. Not much heavier than a normal folding chair
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: While the design of the chair is excellent, the quality is poor. We love the canopy’s versatility. 2 of the 4 chairs we have already have rips in the fabric or the fabric was never stitched well to the rings that hold the fabric to the leg bars. We have used these chairs less than 10x with bodies that are now where near the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jondy Britton

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous chair with sunroof and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the opportunity to use my chair once but it was a good test. It was very windy and the roof stayed put. It was easy to carry, not too heavy and it was comfortable. The roof was a blessing because I have skin cancer and don't want sun, even with sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you sit straight down, nice and slowly
customer_reviews.text: I love the chairs and they provide great shade. Easy to set up and pretty sturdy. They hold at least 40 lbs over the max weight without any issue. Only warning, sit straight down when sitting. I accidentally sat back and down too quickly, and I flipped right over. It would have gotten a million views online for sure because it was that funny, but it did hurt my back a little.
customer_reviews.author: srfarmer

customer_reviews.title: this is great easy to fold and the canopy can be tilted ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a newborn and needed something to keep her shaded while out with my toddler, this is great easy to fold and the canopy can be tilted around more than I expected. It is kinda thin canvas material and might not last that long but for the price as long as it gets me through the summer it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got these in Yesterday and they are nice for the money we spent on them. They go up real easy and do what they were made for. Yes there not top quality but I think for the money they are very nice. I would also say they are not made for Larger size people. My hubby 6fr 210 and he fits in it nice.
customer_reviews.author: pattyconklin

customer_reviews.title: Big Enough and still lightweight to carry - Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair - Very sturdy for a Big MAN, who is 6'4 250+ lbs; He has ample space in the seat and a good amount of head room with the canopy down. Also the canopy is ADJUSTABLE!! OMG you can move the top to different positions without putting it all the way down! He has his pocket on the side where he can put his truck keys or whatever... it is super nice and its not even that heavy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: A. Towe Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - even worse customer service and support!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived defective and we missed the cutoff to return by four days. The vendor finally allowed us to return but didn't supply a FedEx or UPS label. What's worse is that they have not bothered to respond to subsequent requests for assistance. I would never purchase from this vendor again nor any vendors who don't back up what they sell!
customer_reviews.author: dancin' D

customer_reviews.title: fits a 6'9" man really well... and then breaks.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my father for fishing. He is 6'9" and needed a chair that could provide some much needed shade The canopy part is great... it is adjustable so a person of just about any height can use it without have the canopy rest on their head. Update:: the chair broke after less than 20 uses so I changed the rating from 5 stars to 1 star. Of course it was just outside of the return window so now we're out of luck. Don't buy if you plan on actually using!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design!
customer_reviews.text: I think of the Three Stooges when I open or close this difficult chair. The design is terrible! If the shade is up, the chair will blow over easily if unoccupied. If the shade is down, the chair falls over. It is uncomfortable and heavy. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: UV protect it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent chair after two summers. I would HIGHLY recommend spraying some sort of UV protection on it right away. It started to fade at the end of last summer. Now it’s grey and the yellow striping is white. Everything else is holding up good so far.
customer_reviews.author: AudioDreamer

customer_reviews.title: We bought two and they're the best! Got it for the kids baseball games
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and they're the best! Got it for the kids baseball games. If it's a cloudy and a sunny day, it's great that I can pull the shade over me or fold it back down when I don't need it. It's great quality and the cup holders seem to be a lil bigger than standard.
customer_reviews.author: JaQ RoD

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I set it up in my house, easy pop up and adjust, sat in it it's sturdy and the top is big so it shade my whole body and arms and the back is pretty high on me (I'm short). Also this doesn't feel any heavier than my normal chair. I can't wait to use this at the beach or on a deck. I'd originally bought it for a street fair I would be attending as I wasn't sure if I wanted to buy a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Lina A Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! If you’ve reading reviews and looking for the perfect sun blocking chair, this is it! You don’t get to pick your fancy color however... This bad boy bends and moves in every way possible to Block the sun!!! This is the best sports mom Item I’ve ever paid for! Soccer, baseball, football, cheer... amazing!
customer_reviews.author: kara phillips

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the box arrived I opened it to check out my new chairs. First I noticed the durable material. It's not the cheap nylon. Second I noticed the color. It's a blue-teal color with orange piping. Love that combination. Finally I opened the chair and had a seat. It's comfortable... the back is higher than most. I am 5'8" and the back is almost to my shoulders. The canopy is easy to adjust. I'm looking forward to our sunny soccer season and camping trip with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Sapp Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This chair was so uncomfortable. Your knees are forced together like you're in hole, and the bar hurts the back of your legs. I would not be able to last through my Grandson's baseball games sitting in this chair. I ended up ordering a Renetto and it's the most comfortable canopy chair you can buy !
customer_reviews.author: Escape23

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have while training our new puppy. It's VERY NICE! Easy to put togther, the sunshade adjusts well. The seat is higher then 'normal' folding chairs. There are handles on the chair itself so carrying is EASY. I unfold the chair when puppy has to go out and once she's done, I fold it up and put it back on the lania.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this chair! The chair is solid & sturdy. I love how the canopy adjusts to all different positions to block out the sun. The 2 cup holders and pocket are perfect. Can’t beat the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Used it at the beach this summer. It's relatively cheap material but it held up pretty well for the conditions that I used it in. My only problem was that it was a bit top heavy and catches wind easily which can tip it over. Also putting a bookbag over the back of the chair would tip it back unless someone was sitting in the seat. This can be a bit annoying as you either have to move it to the seat each time or put it somewhere else. Overall, great for the price and would buy another if I needed some shade on a hot day at the beach or elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool sunshade portable chairs. One of the 2 I bought broke in front (grommet popped out); but I was able to repair it very easily with a threaded bolt and nut in minutes and it is as good as new. Other than that the other one was solid and they work well. The only thing I would say it the design should be slightly wider and the leg height slightly lower. I am 5'11" and sitting is a little awkward but doable. Other than that a good buy and I picked them up for about 22% less than sticker. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Get this product.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is superb. I love this product and so does my wife and friends. You will definitely want to get this chair for beach and etc. Easy to carry and easy to operate. It does exactly what it stated it would do. I love the way it keeps you shaded.
customer_reviews.author: James o. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: The shade is a problem.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs and the top shade is very hard to pull out of the bracket to unfold. It took some strengths of trying to unlatch it from the bracket and my husband and I are both strong in weight training working out daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: This chair is easy to set up and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair is easy to set up and comfortable. The shade is a bit flimsy and doesn't hold up well. I think I'll need to bring a screw driver with me camping in order to tighten the shade arms every time. That's kind of a bummer! Wish it locked. Also, the trim is BRIGHT yellow and navy. Think Fallout colors. Still, the price is killer for what you get. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: FRAME IT'S WEAK, UNDER 200 LBS CHAIR! OTHERWISE GREAT CHAIR!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice Chair. Well worth the money. BUT it's a very weak chair. I weight 205 LBS and when I sat in it the frame bent. I don't know. I probably got a weak chair or not. I really wished they make them a little bit stronger. I would buy couple of this chairs again if they will make their frame a little stronger. If you weight under 200 lbs I think this will work for you
customer_reviews.author: AX

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my MIL for mother's day. She thought it was fantastic. She used it at her great grandson's baseball games and for her family reunion/ birthday party. Before she opened it she told my husband to make sure she had a chair for the party because she was not sitting on a picnic table all day!
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Best chairs ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use at the beach (instead of renting the crazy priced chairs and umbrellas) and they were perfect. Have used tons of times at ball games, etc. Very sturdy, easy to set up and easy to carry. You can adjust the shade for different angles (at your back if that's where the sun is) or not use at all. So many people have asked where we got these! Love them! (GREAT Price too for the quality!)
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Very good compact folding chair.
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat. Excellent for storage in the back of the car. The only thing (for me) that would be better would be a little less material in the middle of the seat so that it does not sink as much as it does. But you can always add a small cushion or pillow. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great value for the money. Easy to set up and fold back up to put away in their bags. I'm an older, not very strong woman, and have no difficulty carrying it over my shoulder. Frame and fabric seem very sturdy and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaded chair for sunny/ rainy days....
customer_reviews.text: love this canopy style chair - after getting roasted during one of the hot summer soccer games where there was no shade trees close by. I noticed recently though if you don't need the canopy, its difficult to remove the canopy part as it is attached - looks funny if you are watching evening lighted fields games with canopy on :) I had to let it fall backwards - although that causes to flip the chair as soon as you stand up. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Herman G

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was terrible and it was missing an end cap for one of the poles holding up the canopy. Seems sturdy enough and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: A bit bulky but what can you really expect from ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky but what can you really expect from a chair with an added cover. My wife many uses it and she won't go anywhere outdoors without it. Set up and break down is a breeze. Done in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for shade, but awkward folding
customer_reviews.text: The depth of the seat could be larger. I'm a small person, and the bottom bar hits me a few inches above my knee. It's really awkward to fold up. But I'm keeping it because I need the shade when I go to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Chair is fine but got the wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the navy blue for my husband but got a teal chair with orange trim - luckily my son likes orange and was willing to trade but it wasn’t quite what we expected. Chair is great, just wanted the color we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: mrsgebo

customer_reviews.title: Like..but heavy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to fold..this is my second one because in folding shade screen bent..but like sunscreen do bought another. Will be more careful. Also heavy to catty and seat not real comfortable. So why did I buy again?
customer_reviews.author: joy abbott bucci

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these chairs. They are pretty sturdy. I used them on the beach w/o any issues. I'm heavier than the 225 max that they are rated for and had no problems. The only complaint is that one of them had small holes in the canopy. Customer Care gave me a partial credit so I wouldn't have to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: JustAce2006

customer_reviews.title: EFFECTIVE & AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: Amazon delivered in knick of time and this chair saved me from heat stroke at company picnic for sure. Easy to assemble after studying canopy for a few minutes. I was making it more difficult then it was. Sturdy material and held weight well too. If it had a recliner I would have been asleep! Great purchase.Bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Ripping after 3 uses/Very poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2, they arrived and seemed like a great purchase. Have had them a few weeks and used 3 times. Both sides on both chairs are ripping. Were used by persons weighing 100 lbs less than rating.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice, then broke the first time we used it. Disappointing will see if the replace and will update review accordingly
customer_reviews.author: JanskiNJ

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Chair is average at best but the shape helps. The actual chair is one if the cheap chairs you can get at Dicks but they add the canopy and it’s a step up. I’d recommend but I don’t expect it to last very long
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Took it camping right away. The shade works nicely. I read reviews where people said it didn't stand up in wind, but we had unexpected high winds and it did great. I will be buying another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coverage for this type of chair. My only complaint is that the cross bars that support canvas seat area make contact with outside of thighs when sitting. This gets annoying very quickly. I've noticed other (more expensive) chairs don't have his issue through better design. For the price, though, I can forgive the short coming.
customer_reviews.author: JPrince

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before going camping as I needed a new chair. Its comfortable, and the shade tilts so it helped blocked out the sun. I wouldnt use it to block out rain as the cover isnt designed for that.
customer_reviews.author: BP-JP

customer_reviews.title: It will work for the price...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not the greatest but what can you expect for this price. It's kind of flimsy but again when you consider the cost it is what it is. I think it will be fine for our purpose but if you plan to use the chair regularly you probably should consider buying one that's better constructed because I doubt this will hold uo over time.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great materail.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for keeping cool in the hot sun during pickleball days. It is made with tough material and I love the way the shade is adjustable up and down to lower it when the sun is right in your face. The bag also seems durable and hopefully it will last. All rivets look good and It is a breeze to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids mean Little League games, soccer games, etc. Always in the sun which I can't take. This is a little heavy for a little old lady like me but I can manage it. A little difficult getting back in the bag to carry, but I've used it at several practices and games and even once on the beach and it has done the job every time.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Healy

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Nothing really wrong with the execution but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Nothing really wrong with the execution but I have sat in more comfortable folding outdoor chairs. I can’t put my finger on exactly what is different but I feel it. Definitely not a showstopper. The canopy is worth it if you sit in the sun and want to protect yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair with Cover
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I bought this for my sons, who sit through each others' soccer games in the fall. This chair is adjustable (you can adjust the canopy and bring it lower), protects from the rain, is made of thick material, and is easy to fold back up. It does take a little bit of time to get back into the carry bag but it's not bad enough to complain about at all. No complaints - this is a nice, good-quality, sturdy chair and does exactly what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Used at the beach and soccer games. Confortable but would be nice if hood was removable. It folds back so it works but would be better if it would be removed. A bit clumsy to put in bag. Held up well to high winds on beach
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: got this as a gift for my wife
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my wife and she loves it. it is well made and looks like it should hold up for a long time. she loves the cup holders and I love the shade part. We are not small people so I worry about things not holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Wow you get a lot for your money and prime shipping too.
customer_reviews.text: The plus side is that it is easy to open and adjust the canapy. Nice amount of shade and the chair has the usual comfort that these kind of chairs have. The flip side is it is a bit heavy, but if you aren't going a long way, no problem. I use it next to our pickleball courts to rest in between games.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for comfort and low end fabric.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is too narrow and is uncomfortable. The metal support pieces dig into my legs. I’m a 6’1” so it may be ok for smaller folks. The fabric feels cheap and brittle so longevity is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Jtro

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is sturdy, and it is a comfortable chair. The shading is effective. I use this at work for breaks outside where natural shade is not present after the morning. The unit is lightweight enough to carry back indoors and downstairs easily. Fully assembled - just unfold & enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A Cooney

customer_reviews.title: They said they worked great, both on the parch of their cottage and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs for my daughter an son-in-law to take to the beach with them. They said they worked great, both on the parch of their cottage and on the beach sand. They were also easy to pack and unpack. They have already cleaned them, dried them and packed them away for next year. I'm glad the chairs help them enjoy their vacation.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love the concept of this chair but unfortunately after only 4 months and only a few uses the Seams in the seat have come undone. I only weigh 125 pounds so it is not a weight issue but rather an issue with the quality of the chair. The chair has only been used a few times and it has always been stored indoors in its travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: aimeelyn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to carry
customer_reviews.text: My wife Like the chair but it is hard to carry
customer_reviews.author: Railroadvideoguy

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable and so many people asked where we got them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a music festival lawn seating. We knew it would rain. It was not a heavy rain and the canopy is wide and adjustable. It was comfortable and so many people asked where we got them from. Since we had drinks the side pocket was good for other items.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Two broken in less than one year
customer_reviews.text: It has been a year now after purchasing two of these. They both have fallen apart. From where the legs insert into the plastic feet to the screws and rivets holding the umbrella together. These are not built well. I have other folding chairs I have had for over a decade still going strong. I will not be buying these again and strongly recommend against them.
customer_reviews.author: J Bear

customer_reviews.title: Like the cover
customer_reviews.text: Like my chair, purchased this for FaithFest 2018 and it worked out great. The only problem I experienced was, when I leaned over to talk to some friends, the chair went with me 🙃 Maybe due to the ground, not sure, but I’m happy with this
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I had to share my opinion on this chair. My kids play sports and I often find myself sitting on the side of field baking in the sun. This chair is really easy to set up, it’s just one piece that unfolds. The shade canopy gives quite a bit of coverage and can be tilted in all directions. Also, it seems to be well made and sturdy. To be honest, it’s a tad bit heavy, but definitely worth the extra weight. All in all this was a good purchase for me and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality camping chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality camping chair! Provides great shade, and works great for kids sporting event as long as you have the common sense not sit directly in front of someone else (a nice plus...shade portion can be left folded down if needed). I purchased two more after receiving the first one.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. I love the top cover
customer_reviews.text: The chair is well made. Comfortable. I love the top cover. Worked well the other week when it started raining at baseball. Keeps sun off depending on the position of it. Pain in the butt to close up and get back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: brett painter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vacation Chairs.
customer_reviews.text: We used these at the beach this summer and found them easy to transport to and from our vacation condo. My husband and I are not as mobile as we once were and find sitting in low beach chairs challenging. These were perfect for us and we love the cup holders as well as the side pockets, great for holding books,sunglasses and other items. The Canopy top meant no extra lugging of a beach umbrella for us.
customer_reviews.author: judith Simonds

product_meta.title: Quik Shade MAX Shade Chair, Navy
product_meta.description: Relax and kick back while you shield yourself from the sun with the Quik Shade MAX Shade Camp Chair. This comfy outdoor chair unfolds with no assembly required and then folds easily back up into a compact carrying bag with a shoulder strap. Just open the chair and the shade clicks into position with one easy motion, held in place by the included tension rod. The patented design allows the sun shade to raise, lower, and tilt to block the sun from any angle, without leaving the comfort of your chair - and with the new MAX Shade design you get 40% more shade! The tough 300 x 600D polyester fabric is moisture, mold, mildew, and stain resistant, and can easily be wiped clean. The chair back has a higher arch and is also constructed from breathable mesh that lets air flow through to help keep you cool while you relax. With the convenient mesh storage pouch on the side, you can keep your snacks or accessories close at hand. Stay hydrated on those hot summer days outside with dual cup holders and lounge around in the superior comfort of the 22.5-inch, oversized seat that supports up to 225 pounds. When assembled, chair measures 22.8"L x 22.8"W x 51.6"H and seat is 18.5 inches from ground, and weighs only 9 pounds. Includes 1 folding camp chair and 1 carry bag.Rib Tubing Diameter:0.63 inch
feature_bullets: Portable folding camp chair with adjustable MAX Shade canopy and 2 fabric and mesh cup holders
Durable steel frame with higher arched back and 22.5" wide seat supports weight up to 225 lbs.
Tough 300 x 600D polyester fabric is water and stain resistant
Shade raises, lowers, and tilts with no extra adjustments for maximum sun protection
Extra-strong chair fabric bag with carry strap.Rib Tubing Diameter:0.63 inch
